section.title: Description of DFC Application Router
section.para: Instead of using the &PLATFORM_NAME; Default Application Router, any SIP Servlets 1.1 compliant Application Router can be used, such as the eCharts DFC Application Router

section.title: Installing the DFC Application Router
section.para: Detailed instructions are available from the eCharts website or the following procedures describe how to install the eCharts DFC Application Router (DFCAR) on a variety of SIP Servlet Server platforms.

step.title: Deploy the DFCAR
step.para: Drop the dfcar.jar from the ECharts distribution package in TOMCAT_HOME/lib directory

step.title: Remove the DAR
Deploy the DFCAR
step.para: Drop the dfcar.jar from the ECharts distribution package in JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy/jbossweb.sar/ directory.

step.title: Remove the DAR
step.para: Remove the &PLATFORM_NAME; Default Application Router located in JBOSS_HOME/server/default/deploy/jbossweb.sar/sip-servlets-application-router-*.jar
